front.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol version 6 (DHCPv6) Option for IPv4 Configuration

abstract.t: This document defines a DHCPv6 option with two types of sub-options for IPv4 configurations in the case of IPv4/IPv6 transition. One is used for the assignment of IPv4 address and port set, the other is used for configuring existing DHCPv4 options required by clients for IPv4-over-IPv6 communications.
